column4: Information about the observing scan and subscan(s)
Free-from textual description of the data or other relevant information, useful when obsGoal is OTHER
Date of observation  at start of integration. FITS standard format
Information about the spectral observing band
expected line(s) identification formula. e.g. "CO".  Single ID or comma separated list
expected line(s) transition, e.g. “1-0”. Single ID or comma separated list
The title of the project as submitted by the PI
Total on-source integration time for all obsnums this ObsDataList
Velocity type of FITS cube axis3, either frequency or velocity
The observatory or facility where the data was obtained.
The instrument used to collect the data.
Astronomical Objects represented in the data (Given as SIMBAD recognizable names preferred).
Integer indicating level of calibration. 0 = no calibration, 1 = first level, 2 = second level, etc
